mapper.select: -- 스탠다드 구독 내역 조회 -- select sub_lf.SUB_LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_ST_COIN, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe join LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST sub_lf on sub_lf.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_ID join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on lf.lf_id = sub_lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = sub_lf.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS = 1
